recommendations: Arnav Yadav “We’ve worked together on several projects and Komal is one of the best people to have as a teammate. I have known her to be diligent, since and highly enthusiastic in all her endeavours. Her ability to solve financial problems helped us during difficult assignments and we were able to innovate. Out of all her great qualities, her curiosity to keep learning more inspires me the most.”

Tanya Seth “Komal is an extremely good communicator and great colleague to work with. Komal and I have been college mates and have interned in the same organization. It has always been a delight to know about finance, consulting and strategy from Komal. She has always aced all college events with her management and leadership skills. She has extraordinary attention to detail and I look forward to work with her again.”

volunteer_experience.info: TEDx is a grassroot initiative, created in the spirit to research and discover “ideas worth spreading.” It brings together a community of passionate speakers who seek to uncover new ideas and to share the latest research in their local areas that spark conversations through their life events. Speaker for the theme - Rediscovering Individualism
volunteer_experience.subtitle: TED Conferences
volunteer_experience.title: Speaker

volunteer_experience.info:
Enactus is an international organization that connects student, academic and business leaders through entrepreneurial-based projects that empower people to transform opportunities into real, sustainable progress for themselves and their communities. It is a non-profit student run organization spread across 37 countries that aims to empower underprivileged communities by implementing sustainable business models.Worked on a diverse range of social and environmental projects including…
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          Enactus is an international organization that connects student, academic and business leaders through entrepreneurial-based projects that empower people to transform opportunities into real, sustainable progress for themselves and their communities. It is a non-profit student run organization spread across 37 countries that aims to empower underprivileged communities by implementing sustainable business models.Worked on a diverse range of social and environmental projects including digital literary, sanitation awareness and clean water initiative.
